titles.title: Behold How Good And How Pleasant

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Behold how good
and pleasant it is
For brothers
To dwell together
For brothers
To dwell together in unity (repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It is like the precious oil
Upon the head
Coming down upon the beard
Even Aaron's beard
Coming down upon
The edge of his robes
It is like Hermons dew

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Coming down upon
The mountains
Down upon the mountains of Zion - Zion
For there the Lord hath commanded
Comanded the blessing
Of life forever and ever more
